songs.title: I Would Rather Go Blind
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Something told me it was [?]
When I saw you and her talking
Something deep down in my soul starts crying out
When I saw you and that girl walking around

[Chorus]
I would rather, I would rather go blind, boy
Than to see you walk away from me, child, no

[Chorus]
I was just, I was just, I was just sitting here thinking
Of your kiss and your warm embrace
And the reflection in the glass that I held to my lips, now, baby
Revealed these tears that are on my face

[Chorus]
And, baby, baby, I'd rather be blind, boy
Than to see you walk away, walk away from me, yeah
Baby, baby, I would rather be blind, boy
Than to see you walk away, walk away from me

[Outro]
Something told me it was [?]
When I saw you and her talking

[Outro: Spoken]
I messed it up in that fucking...
Baby, baby, I'd rather be blind, boy
Than to see you walk away, walk away from me, yeah
That's what I wanted to do
